text: @Mike_Pence @NYGovCuomo @GovMurphy @GovNedLamont @CDCgov Stem cells through I.V...! It will heal everyone with COVID-19 in one day. Call a specialist and they will confirm this.. let's start saving lives and getting everything back to normal.  Babies are born by the thousands dr. Everyday and the umbilical cord thrown away. A cure!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
